title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (Node + browsers).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface, model manager, RAG).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced interactive CLI with chat history, syntax highlighting, plugins.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example using Ollama + llama-index for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat, generate code, and refactor with Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-digital-assistant
summary: Raspberry Pi image + Flask app that gives Ollama a voice via whisper & piper TTS.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-maintained Rust crate for interacting with the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Go client library for Ollama with context-aware chat sessions and embedding helpers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models to any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with Ollama models in channels or DMs.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama with session memory and model switcher.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted writing, summarization, and note Q&A using Ollama.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Spring Boot starter and Kotlin extensions.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Community-curated collection of custom Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs ready for ollama pull.
